rule.name: --workflowmanager--timeconflictcard--archive
rule.title: archive transition content rule
rule.description: This content rule was automatically created by the workflow manager to create actions on workflow events. If you want the behavior to work as expected, do not modify this outside the workflow manager.

action.property:
You have archived this time conflict card:
{{ context.absolute_url() }}
-------------
Request is for {{ context.getFullname() }} ({{context.getStudentemail()}})
for semester code: {{context.getPsterm()}}
and is between:
{{context.getSubject1()}} {{context.getCatalognumber1()}} {{context.getSectionnumber1()}} (class number is {{context.getClassnumber1()}}, instructor is {{context.getMemberEmail(context.getInstructorID1())}})
and:
{{context.getSubject2()}} {{context.getCatalognumber2()}} {{context.getSectionnumber2()}} (class number is {{context.getClassnumber2()}}, instructor is {{context.getMemberEmail(context.getInstructorID2())}})
Here is your explanation of the conflict:
{{context.getComments()}}
{% for m in context.getRegistrarGroupMemberEmails() %} {{ m }}, {% endfor %}
[REGISTRAR] you have archived this time conflict card for {{ context.getFullname() }}

and:

{{ context.getStudentemail() }}

action.property:

{{context.getComments()}}

{% if portal.portal_workflow.getInfoFor(context, 'review_state') != 'private' %} {{ context.getMemberEmail(context.getInstructorID1()) }}, {% endif %} {% if portal.portal_workflow.getInfoFor(context, 'review_state') in ('needinstructor2approval', 'instructor2waitingforstudentresponse', 'studenthasbeeninformedenrollmentdenied', 'retracted', 'registrarprocessing', 'completed', 'archived') %} {{ context.getMemberEmail(context.getInstructorID2()) }}, {% endif %} {{ context.getStudentemail() }}, {% if portal.portal_workflow.getInfoFor(context, 'review_state') in ('registrarprocessing', 'completed', 'archived', 'retracted') %} {% for m in context.getRegistrarGroupMemberEmails() %} {{ m }}, {% endfor %} {% endif %}
[REGISTRAR] a comment has been added to a time conflict card for {{ context.getFullname() }}
